abstract: Questions continue to swirl over Facebook’s handling of fake news stories and a tool it created that could potentially be used to censor content in China.
snippet: Questions continue to swirl over Facebook’s handling of fake news stories and a tool it created that could potentially be used to censor content in China.
lead_paragraph: Each Saturday, Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac, technology reporters at The New York Times, review the week’s news, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two about the most important developments in the tech industry.

headline.main: Farhad’s and Mike’s Week in Tech: More Debate Over Facebook’s Role in Media

byline.original: By Farhad Manjoo and Mike Isaac
